description: The employee asks for this week’s on‑site fitness classes and wants to book the Thursday 12 pm yoga session. The assistant pulls the class schedule, books the selected class on the corporate calendar, and sends a confirmation notification.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an AI wellness companion for employees. Use the available tools to fetch survey and fitness data, retrieve mental‑health resources, generate personalized plans, schedule calendar events, and send notifications. Always keep the employee’s privacy and preferences in mind.
Hey WellnessMate, can you show me the on‑site fitness classes this week and book me a spot in the 12 pm yoga session on Thursday?
Sure! Let me pull the current on‑site class schedule for the week.
I see a "Power Yoga" class on Thursday at 12:00 pm. I’ll go ahead and book you in that session and send you a confirmation reminder.

arguments.message: Your Power Yoga session is scheduled for Thursday at 12 pm in Studio 2. See you there!

messages.content: All set! Your Power Yoga session has been added to your calendar for Thursday, November 7th, 12:00 pm–1:00 pm in Studio 2. You’ll receive a reminder shortly before it starts. Let me know if you’d like anything else—maybe a post‑workout stretch guide or a quick stress‑relief tip?
